mapper.select:
select
distinct
from materiel
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from materiel where materielId = #{materielId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delFlg = 0 and isLatestVersion = 1

mapper.select:
select m.*,om.amount as amount ,IFNULL(om.canBillAmount,om.amount) AS canBillAmount,om.orderUnitPrice as orderUnitPrice
, IFNULL(ibr.billCount,0) as billAmount
, 0 as billAmount
from orderMateriel om left join materiel m on om.materielSerial=m.serialNum
left join invoiceBillingRecord ibr on ibr.orderMaterielSerial=om.materielSerial
where om.orderSerial=#{orderSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and ibr.invoiceSerial=#{invoiceSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
